ca.uqac.lif.labpal

Class ResultReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.ResultReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ResultReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Reports the status of a lab instance to a server at a given HTTP address.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

      • getExceptions

        public java.util.List<ResultReporter.ReporterException> getExceptions()
        Gets the list of exceptions generated when trying to report results
        Returns:
        The list of exceptions

      • reportResults

        public java.lang.String reportResults()
                               throws ResultReporter.ReporterException
        Reports the results of the lab. This is done by sending an HTTP POST request with the zipped contents of the lab.
        Returns:
        The HTTP response obtained from the request
        Throws:
        ResultReporter.ReporterException - If the sending of the HTTP request resulted in an error

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl()
        Gets the URL of the host to report to
        Returns:
        The URL

      • setInterval

        public void setInterval(int interval)
        Sets the interval at which results will be reported
        Parameters:
        interval - The interval (in ms) at which the lab's results will be reported. Don't set it too small, as reporting involves serializing the lab, sending an HTTP request and waiting for the response. Set it to a negative value to disable reporting.
